definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: The jury arrives at its verdict in the seclusion of the jury room.
sentences.chinese: 陪審團在隔離的評議室裏作出裁定。

sentences.english: The deliberations shall be recorded in writing, and the transcript shall be signed by the members of the collegial panel.
sentences.chinese: 評議應當製作筆錄，由合議庭成員簽名。

sentences.english: Dissenting opinions in the deliberations must be truthfully entered in the transcript.
sentences.chinese: 評議中的不同意見，必須如實記入筆錄。

sentences.english: But the panel never suggested that the low-ranking missions should be shut down this year.
sentences.chinese: 但評議小組並未提議將今年就停止那些級別低的使命。

sentences.english: Democratic appraisal shall be conducted at least once every year and hosted by the village affairs supervisory organ.
sentences.chinese: 民主評議每年至少進行一次，由村務監督機構主持。

sentences.english: It is shown that the Second Council of Academia Sinica played a key role in making preparations for the assembly.
sentences.chinese: 中央研究院第二屆評議會對會議的籌備起到關鍵作用。

sentences.english: Let the masses discuss who will be chosen as an advanced worker.
sentences.chinese: 讓羣衆評議一下誰當先進工作者。

sentences.english: The inflexible system of peer" s review makes the non-unanimous items lacked in necessary protection."
sentences.chinese: 同行評議制度的僵化使非共識項目得不到應有保護。

sentences.english: Yet no claim has been peer-reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 然而這類主張沒有一項經過了同行評議。

sentences.english: Peer review innovation because by definition innovators have no peers.
sentences.chinese: 同行評議創新是由於按照定義，創新者沒有同行。

sentences.english: The committee are supposed to pass on the qualifications of the applicants.
sentences.chinese: 委員會有權評議申請人的資格。

sentences.english: How do you view the roles and functions of the Convocation ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎樣看待大學評議會的角色和功能？

pinyin: Shan3 xi1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2
Hua2 dong1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2

definition: surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to give a lecture/to lecture on

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2

definition: Suzhou or Soochow University (Suzhou, PRC since 1986)
